name: night tune
description:
night tune
· · ○ • · tune in tonight

game by Pol Clarissou · polclarissou.com · @polclarissou

car model by Pierre Mervaillie · pierremervaillie.wordpress.com · yadoob.tumblr.com

night tune's main version (windows only) allows you to play your own MP3 files, however this might not work on some computers - depending on your drivers.
the other builds only accept WAV files, but are more stable.

you will also not be able to follow shortcuts when browsing folders.
